broadwick.xml

Class XmlParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.xml.XmlParser

  • public final class XmlParser
extends Object
    This simple class can be used to parse the XML string that the framework supplies to the model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private XmlParser()
      Hiding utility class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Object unmarshallXmlString(String xmlStr, Class<?> clazz)
      This method unmarshalls (reads) the supplied XML string using JAXB using the supplied class object to create the JAXB context.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlParser

        private XmlParser()
        Hiding utility class constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • unmarshallXmlString

        public static Object unmarshallXmlString(String xmlStr,
                         Class<?> clazz)
                                  throws JAXBException
        This method unmarshalls (reads) the supplied XML string using JAXB using the supplied class object to create the JAXB context. The class object MUST be valid JAXB compliant and be annotated with @XmlRootElement otherwise a RuntimeException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        xmlStr - a bare XML string (with no header information).
        clazz - the java class that can be recognized by a JAXBContext.
        Returns:
        on Object with the same class as the clazz parameter, populated with the elements of the XML.
        Throws:
        JAXBException - if the XML cannot be unmarshalled.
